info.title: Scheduling Agreements
info.description: This service enables you to create, read, update and delete purchase scheduling agreements from any external system through an API call. Once the purchase scheduling agreement has been created or updated, the scheduling agreement number is sent in the response. If there are any issues while managing (create, read or update) purchase scheduling agreements, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Create, update or delete purchase scheduling agreements

get.summary: Gets the details of all the account assignments of all the items, in all the purchase scheduling agreements
get.description: Gets the account assignment details of all the accounting lines of all the items, in all the purchase scheduling agreements in the system. Note that if there are many purchase scheduling agreements in the system, you can add options such as, $skip and $top to narrow down the result set.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Adds a new accounting line to an item in a purchase scheduling agreement
post.description: Adds a new accounting line to an item in a purchase scheduling agreement, using the number of the purchase scheduling agreement and item number.It is mandatory to provide the number of the purchase scheduling agreement and item number in the request body.

parameters.name: AccountAssignmentNumber
parameters.description: Sequential Number of Account Assignment

parameters.name: SchedulingAgreementItem
parameters.description: Item Number of Purchasing Document

parameters.name: SchedulingAgreement
parameters.description: Purchasing Document Number

get.summary: Gets the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement
get.description: Gets the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement. This operation uses the number of the purchase scheduling agreement, item number, and number of the accounting line.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement
patch.description: Updates the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement. This operation uses the number of the purchase scheduling agreement, item number, and number of the accounting line.

get.summary: Gets the header details of all the purchase scheduling agreements in the system
get.description: Gets the header details of all the purchase scheduling agreement in the system. Note that if there are many purchase scheduling agreements in the system, you can add options such as, $skip and $top to narrow down the result set.

post.summary: Creates a purchase scheduling agreement with one or more items
post.description: Creates a purchase scheduling agreement with one or more items and dependent objects, such as schedule line, accounting, delivery address, header notes, item notes, partners, and subcontracting components.

parameters.name: SchedulingAgreement
parameters.description: Purchasing Document Number

get.description: Gets the header details such as supplier, company code, currency and soon of a purchase scheduling agreements using the using the number of the purchase scheduling agreement.

patch.description: Updates the header details of a purchase scheduling agreement using the number of the purchase scheduling agreement. This operation can be performed only when the fields are modifiable.

patch.description: Updates the item note of a specific note type of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement. This operation uses the number of the purchase scheduling agreement, text ID that identifies the type of note, reference application object, and language key.

delete.summary: Deletes the item note of a specific note type of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement
delete.description: Deletes the item note of a specific note type of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement. This operation uses the number of the purchase scheduling agreement, text ID that identifies the type of note, reference application object, and language key.

get.summary: Gets the subcontracting component details of all the items in all the purchase scheduling agreements in the system
get.description: Gets the subcontracting component details of all the items in all the purchase scheduling agreements in the system. Note that if there are many purchase scheduling agreements in the system, you can add options such as, $skip and $top to narrow down the result set.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.description: Purchasing Document

parameters.description: Purchasing Document Item

parameters.name: ScheduleLine
parameters.description: Delivery Schedule Line Counter

parameters.name: ReservationItem
parameters.description: Reservation Item

parameters.name: RecordType
parameters.description: Reservation Record Type

get.summary: Gets the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement
get.description: Gets the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement. This operation uses the number of the purchase scheduling agreement, item number, and number of the scheduling line.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement
patch.description: Updates the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement. This operation uses the number of the purchase scheduling agreement, item number, number of the schedule line, reservation item and reservation type.

delete.summary: Deletes the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement
delete.description: Deletes the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase scheduling agreement. This operation uses the number of the purchase scheduling agreement, item number, number of the schedule line, reservation item and reservation type.

post.description:
Withdraws a purchase scheduling agreement from approval  
Withdraws a purchase scheduling agreement from approval. The document is then available for further modification. It is mandatory to pass the number of the purchase scheduling agreement.

parameters.name: SchedulingAgreement
parameters.description:
SchedulingAgreement  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Releases all the items of a purchase scheduling agreement  
Releases all the items of a purchase scheduling agreement. It is mandatory to provide the number of the purchase scheduling agreement and type of release.This operation occurs based on the selection of the fields, such as release as per strategy in profile, deactivation of tolerance check, and  deactivation of dynamic stopping for forecast and JIT schedules in the payload. The additional functions in the payload include of selection, standardized release date, move release.

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementStandardRelDate
parameters.description:
Schediling Agreement Release Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementSelectionScope
parameters.description:
Scope of Selection  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementOffJitDynStop
parameters.description: Deactivate Jit Dynamic Stopping

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementOffFrcDynStop
parameters.description: Deactivate Forecast Dynamic Stopping

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementMoveCreateDate
parameters.description:
Move Release Creation Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementdeactJitTolChck
parameters.description: Deactivate Jit Tolerance Check

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementDeactFrcTolChck
parameters.description: Deactivate Forecast Tolearance Check

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementCreateWoutSline
parameters.description: Create without Schedule Line

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementCreateJitOnly
parameters.description: Jit Only

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementCreateFrcOnly
parameters.description: Forecast Only

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementCreateFrcAndJit
parameters.description: Forecast And Jit Schedule

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementWithFrcProfile
parameters.description: Scheduling Agreement Forecast Release Strategy Profile

parameters.name: SchedgAgreementWithJitProfile
parameters.description: Scheduling Agreement Jit Release Strategy Profile

parameters.name: SchedulingAgreement
parameters.description:
Scheduling Agreement  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Releases the item of a purchase scheduling agreement  
Releases the item details of a purchase scheduling agreement. It is mandatory to provide the number of the purchase scheduling agreement, item number and type of release.

parameters.name: SchedulingAgreementReleaseType
parameters.description:
Scheduling Agreement Release Type  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SchedulingAgreementItem
parameters.description:
Scheduling Agreement Item  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SchedulingAgreement
parameters.description:
Scheduling Agreement  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_SchAgrmtAcCnt HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
